org.gvsig.gui.beans.swing.textBoxWithCalendar
Class JCalendarDatePanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.gvsig.gui.beans.swing.textBoxWithCalendar.JCalendarDatePanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, IMethodsForGraphicalCalendarComponents
public class JCalendarDatePanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements IMethodsForGraphicalCalendarComponents, java.io.Serializable

Creates a Panel for include in other panels -> this panel allows users to set the date they want The difference from this class to the JCalendarDatePanel is that in this class the user can move the calendar with the mouse

Author:
Pablo Piqueras Bartolomé (p_queras@hotmail.com)
See Also:
Serialized Form
